examples.util

Class GraphViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.util.GraphViewer

  • public class GraphViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to render and display explanation graphs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GraphViewer.BitmapJFrame
      Receives a byte array as an input, and shows it in a Swing window as a picture.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public static void display(java.util.List<Node> roots,
                           boolean no_captions)
        Displays an explanation graph into a window. This method acts as a primitive image viewer, used to display the result of the examples.
        Parameters:
        roots - The roots of the graph to display
        no_captions - Set to true to hide non-leaf captions

      • display

        public static void display(java.util.List<Node> roots)
        Displays an explanation graph into a window. This method acts as a primitive image viewer, used to display the result of the examples.
        Parameters:
        roots - The roots of the graph to display

      • display

        public static void display(Node root)
        Displays an explanation graph into a window. This method acts as a primitive image viewer, used to display the result of the examples.
        Parameters:
        root - The root of the graph to display

      • save

        public static void save(java.util.List<Node> roots,
                        java.lang.String filename,
                        boolean no_captions)
        Saves a graph to a file.
        Parameters:
        roots - The roots of the graph to display
        filename - The file where this graph will be saved
        no_captions - Set to true to hide non-leaf captions

      • save

        Saves a graph to a file.
        Parameters:

        filename - The file where this graph will be saved
        no_captions - Set to true to hide non-leaf captions

      • toDot

        public static java.lang.String toDot(java.util.List<Node> roots,
                                     boolean no_captions)
        Renders a graph as a DOT file.
        Parameters:
        roots - The roots of the graph to render
        no_captions - Set to true to hide non-leaf captions
        Returns:
        A string with the contents of the DOT file

      • getGraph

        protected static byte[] getGraph(java.util.List<Node> roots,
                                 boolean no_captions)
        Renders a graph, calls DOT in the background and retrieves the binary image it produces.
        Parameters:
        roots - The roots of the graph to render
        no_captions - Set to true to hide non-leaf captions
        Returns:
        An array of bytes containing the image to display
